metadata.title: CVE-2017-18550 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in drivers/scsi/aacraid/commctrl.c in the Linuxkernel before 4.13. There is potential exposure of kernel stack memorybecause aac_get_hba_info does not initialize the hbainfo structure.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
